title: Thaw - Earth Ground (2014)
description:
Thaw is a Polish band who predominantly plays black metal with a mixture of drone, industrial and noise elements incorporated into the music. The bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s lineup is composed of Maciek in both Bass and Vocals , Art playing Guitars , Piotr in Synth, and Greg in Drums.

Thaw combines elements of black metal with great ambience, atmospheres that transport you directly to the woods in the night, also with a pinch of noise and some drone too.

They're currently under Witching Hour Productions label, and have launched two demos (Decay - 2010 and Advance - 2012), two split albums (w/Outre - 2013 and w/Echoes Of Yul - 2014), one single (Afterkingdom - 2013) and two full length albums, a self titled release that came out on May 10th, 2013 (under Avantgarde Music label) and what's their last release to date, Earth Ground, on October 10th, 2014.
